title: Paras Chhabra's girlfriend Akanksha Puri:Shehnaaz Gill & Mahira Sharma Fight Over Paras Chhabra In Bigg Boss And His Girlfriend Akanksha Puri 'Can’t Stop Laughing'
text:
In the first task itself, Paras Chhabra emerged out to be the most popular man in the Bigg Boss 13 house, where most of the ladies gave their hearts to him. However, he, in that moment, broke many hearts to choose Mahira Sharma. And that was the beginning of a love triangle.

Twitter

Later, in an episode, we saw contestants Shehnaaz Gill and Mahira Sharma getting into an ugly argument over Paras Chhabra. That is when Shehnaaz asks Paras to pick one between Mahira and her. While all this was happening, Paras Chhabra’s girlfriend Akanksha Puri was having the last laugh back home.

toiimg.com

In an interview with The Times Of India, when she was asked about the same, Akanksha said, “I saw the latest promo of Shehnaaz and Mahira Sharma fighting for Paras and I couldn’t stop laughing. He is doing a wonderful job on the show. If he is making two people lose their focus from the game and is making them fight for him, then I would say he is a real winner. I am thoroughly enjoying myself while watching him on the show.”

Furthermore, she added that she is not jealous with what is happening on show and that she is very much secure in her relationship. She knows “about his strategy and game plans”. So, even if “he is flirting,” she doesn’t mind.

Instagram

For the unversed, Akansha Puri is a TV actress. She has appeared in movie Calendar Girls and TV show Vighnaharta Ganesha. They have been dating for quite some time and have even declared their love for each other on social media.
